admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would focus on
            agricultural credit to farmers, farmers cooperatives and
            small rural businesses to finance investments covering a
            wide range of agricultural production and other activities
            that would diversify the sources of rural incomes. It would
            also address the institutional development issues facing the
            National Agricultural Cooperative Federation (NACF), the
            main credit institution serving agriculture.
